articles.title: The 5 Deadliest Heart Conditions in America Today — and Their Biggest Risk Factors - Money Talks News
articles.description: A new report reveals that progress against heart disease has stalled while key risk factors continue to climb.
articles.content:
Cardiovascular disease remains the leading killer in the United States, but a comprehensive new report suggests the country is losing ground in the fight against it.
